aircraft.value: Cobra Advanced - AC-1826-591 at Forward Operating Base-3

defect_observed.value: Emergency lighting system failure. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Emergency Power component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Issue technical bulletin to all operators

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 16/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 19/09/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 20/09/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 21/09/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 24/09/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

a) Root Cause Analysis: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Emergency Power component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
